## Before this PR
Issue is described at length: https://github.com/palantir/gradle-git-version/issues/468
## After this PR
Usages of `git-version` on submodules no longer errors out.
## Possible downsides?
New versions have breaking changes to the used APIs. | https://github.com/palantir/gradle-git-version/pull/581 |
_Automated release, no documented user facing changes_

_This release is functionally identical to 0.11.0_

Re-tagged 0.11.0 so that we have a non-RC version as the latest version

name: 0.12.0-rc2
body:
- Re-create a `Git` object every time tasks are invoked (#96)
- Upgrade jgit (#95)

name: 0.12.0-rc1
body: - Use only jgit (#94)

- Run a JGit implementation in addition to the original ‘shelling out’ approach to validate correctness
- Convert plugin source to Java

name: 0.11.0-rc6
body: - Fixed back-compat by using 'extraProperties' instead of a normal extension (#92)

name: 0.11.0-rc4
body: - Another publishing fix

name: 0.11.0-rc3
body: - Publishing fix

name: 0.11.0-rc2
body:
Failed to publish
- Native vs JGit (#89)

name: 0.11.0-rc1
body:
Doesn't work
- Run a JGit implementation in addition to the original ‘shelling out’ approach to validate correctness
- [Fix] Versions like `1.2.3-abcd-20` now contain the correct commit SHA instead of the erroneous tag SHA (#81)
- Use rev-list --first-parent to support git < 1.8.4 (#77)
- Re-release of 0.9.0 with correct plugin portal publishing (#73)
- Add non-abbreviated GitHash as gitHashFull (#68)
- Add support specify tag prefixes of the form `my-label@1.2.3`
- Add VersionDetails#isCleanTag
- Bump jGit version to 4.5.2.201704071617-r
- Add `--always` flag to yield commit hash versions when no tag is present
- Shell out to external `git` command instead of using JGit
- Match output of 'git describe --first-parent' (#48)
-  VersionDetails now includes branch name

- provide `gitHash` as part of `VersionDetails` (contributed by @mglazer)
- remove Guava dependency and instead use Groovy memoization (contributed by @mglazer)
- `printVersion` task now includes a group and a description
- we now memoize the calls to JGit to improve performance of multiple calls to `gitVersion` or `versionDetails`.
- adds new `versionDetails()` method to provide tag distance and last tag information
- Search parent directories for the `.git` directory.
- Build with Gradle 2.10
- Build with Gradle 2.8
- Build with Gradle 2.7
- Eliminate unnecessary Guava dependency
- Use gradle-git-version 0.1.1 for versioning this plugin
- Add Travis CI builds, Bintray and Gradle Plugins publishing
- Release gradle-git-version publicly
